name: Pixpuzz
description:
Pixpuzz is a short, 8-bit inspired game, where you solve puzzles and move character around to complete different levels.
Currently only WASD / Arrows on keyboard are supported for playing the game.

I made this project for fun, and it is my first game I'm putting out in public. If you enjoy the game, please leave your constructive feedback and follow me on itch.io to stay in loop for my future projects!

Main background track is taken from this website. Game was made with Godot, while pixel art was made in Aseprite. Hope you enjoy the game!
